name: Out For Blood (itch)
description:
You wake up in the familiar darkness of your room. There is a strange man by the door staring at you.

A short horror visual novel made for Nanoreno 2016.

Made by Adoxographist (@adoxtalks)
For full credits, see Credits.txt in the downloadable file.

Author Blurb: This game was made in about a week, starting from April 1st, up until the 7th. Although that doesn't necessarily fit into the confines of Nanoreno, I thought... With the short development time, it still fits into the challenge goals, right? Hahaha.

Either way, the game itself is still somewhat jumpy, and not entirely polished. But.. I tried some new things and pushed myself! I hope you enjoy, nonetheless!!
